actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for tuition expenses for the higher education of themselves, their spouses, or their dependents.

summary.text: Allows individuals a deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for tuition expenses in excess of 3 percent of the taxpayer's adjusted gross income for the higher education of themselves, their spouses, or their dependents.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for tuition expenses for the higher education of themselves, their spouses, or their dependents.
